hero.name: Radhitya Guntoro Adhi
hero.title: Industrial Engineering Student
hero.subtitle: Passionate about technology and innovation
about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi! I'm Radhitya Guntoro Adhi, an Industrial Engineering student at ITB, class of 2023. I firmly believe that civil supremacy and individual freedom are essential values in any civilization. Currently, I am developing an AI-based study planner & tracker app to help students manage their study time more effectively.
about.description2: In addition, I enjoy discussing technology trends and staying updated on the latest developments in coding. In the short term, I am focusing on improving my academic performance, building a digital portfolio, and enhancing my web development skills. As an Industrial Engineering student, I also have a keen interest in Production Planning and Control, Operational Research, and the application of technology in business strategies.
timeline.title: Education & Experience
timeline.education.description: Currently pursuing a degree in Industrial Engineering with focus on Production Planning and Control, and Operational Research.
timeline.experience.description: Responsible for receiving and shipping goods, as well as managing warehouse inventory. Regularly checking inventory and ensuring smooth distribution processes. Worked as part of a team to support efficient operational processes.
skills.title: Technical Skills
projects.title: Projects
projects.restaurant.title: Restaurant Management Application
projects.restaurant.description: Developed a Python-based application to manage restaurant operations, including ordering, inventory management, and financial reporting.
projects.river.title: Cirebon River Care Website
projects.river.description: Built a website for an organization aimed at educating the public on the importance of maintaining the cleanliness of rivers in Cirebon.
